title: 求解怎么删除称号呀~~~~(>_<)~~~~
author: qq972892026
txt_content: 如题  各位大神帮忙呀{:10_493:}

replies.author: 尘曲
replies.txt_content:
manudelv 玩家 prefix
manudelv 玩家 suffix

/manudelv 删除玩家(前缀prefix/后缀suffix)
比如 /manudelv 玩家名 prefix

replies.author: qq972892026
replies.txt_content:
/manudelv 删除玩家(前缀prefix/后缀suffix)
